name: com.unity.content-manager
description:
The Content Manager shows samples, extension packages, and other pieces of content available for a product. It uses the Package Manager API.

The Content Manager specializes in configuring and extending a project after it has been created. It streamlines various types of sample installation and automatically handles soft dependencies.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- Add option to Content Pack to install by default the first time it is found in the project
- Make the Content Manager more compact for a smaller window footprint.
